thread.title: Alex Ovechkin scores fifth goal in five games as Capitals down Canucks
thread.title_full: Alex Ovechkin scores fifth goal in five games as Capitals down Canucks

author: Joshua Clipperton
title: Alex Ovechkin scores fifth goal in five games as Capitals down Canucks
text: Hockey Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin, right, of Russia, celebrates after scoring what proved to be the game-winning goal against Vancouver Canucks' goalie Ryan Miller during the third period of an NHL hockey game in Vancouver, B.C., on Thursday October 22, 2015. (DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin, right, of Russia, celebrates after scoring what proved to be the game-winning goal against Vancouver Canucks' goalie Ryan Miller during the third period of an NHL hockey game in Vancouver, B.C., on Thursday October 22, 2015.(DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Alex Ovechkin scores fifth goal in five games as Capitals down Canucks Add to ... Joshua Clipperton
